title: Best start yet?
body:
https://imgur.com/CJG2Ohu

So basicly get a level 3 Veigar with 3 seraph's embrace so he can ult after just 1 auto or taking some damage.

Then you need 6 Brawlers, 6 Nobiles or 6 Knights.
Then guardians(2). And thats all.
Can be done on level 8 if you have a bad game hitting level 9 isnt that important.

replies.body:
Talks about "best start yet"
Shows end of game.
okay?

You think i lost this? Vaygar oneshots everyone and has wall of brawlers + braum for voli glacial.
You know vaygar oneshots everyone who's lower level then himself, right?

As a start this one is good but its hard to get 3 seraph's embrace on a level 3 Veygar consistantly and thats when the start starts working.
Veygar will spamm ults that one shot. But its pointless if his not level 3 so use a different sorc/demon who needs 75 mana to ult until veygar is level 3. This game i had Atroxx 2 with a random demon until i got Veygar to 3.

You start looking/rolling for Veygars at level 7(33%) and 8(35% max chance to get a rank 3 unit) untill then hold on to 50 gold for income.
On the item picking stages take only tears.

Vaygar legit only does 1 auto and an ult that oneshots.

He's talking about fact this is a Start of GAME thread. We don't know what you're referring to starting.

P.S. Nobles stomp this comp, especially with a Braum with Thornmail.
Ah yeah i did indeed mean that.
